keyword: how many calories is in a pb and j
title: How Many Calories in a PB&J Sandwich?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a pb and j sandwich, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a PB&J Sandwich?
assumptions: Standard PB&J: 2 slices white bread, 2 tbsp creamy peanut butter, 1 tbsp grape jelly; no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, PB/jelly brands, portion sizes, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard PB&J sandwich has about 390 kcal, with 10 g protein and 47 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat bread instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories is in a pb and j sandwich?
faqs.a: Approximately 390 kcal for a standard PB&J.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a PB&J?
faqs.a: About 10 g protein, mostly from the peanut butter.

faqs.q: Are PB&J sandwiches high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, around 18 g sugars, mainly from jelly and bread.

faqs.q: How does bread type affect PB&J calories?
faqs.a: Whole wheat may lower calories slightly (~20 kcal less) and add more fiber.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie PB&J?
faqs.a: Yes, use less PB, sugar-free jelly, or thin bread to cut ~100 kcal.
